featured.text: While early zoos put emphasis on displaying as many unusual creatures as possible, most modern zoos now focus on conservation and education.
An international team of researchers focused on a population of yellow-bellied sea snakes living near Costa Rica, where rain often does not fall for up to seven months out of the year.

definition.zh_def: 集中注意力或精力於某事物上。
definition.en_def: The center of interest or activity; to concentrate attention or effort.
definition.example: She needs to focus on her studies to improve her grades.
